Character:
Fukashichi, in fact Goro Kanawa (鱶七 実は 金輪五郎 / 鱶七 実は 金輪五郎)

Plays:

The Teachings for Women (Imoseyama onna teikin / 妹背山婦女庭訓)

Authority Control:
April 1986 Program; Kabuki tojo jinbutsu jiten (Tokyo: Hakusuisha, 2006)
